channel.title: SilabSoft client on my piczo site?
channel.description:
Ok,
No, i aint using a propper website because i aint gonna waste money :D i got a piczo site, which i wanna get silabs client to work on my site, i saw a piczo site with this enabled so i know tis possible (felixscape.piczo.com i think.)
So anyone know?? please write back NOW.
All help appreciated, thanks alot.
Edit: I tried the following;
Add html box which says...
Code: <html> <title>WEBCLIENT NAME</title> <center><applet name="app" width="765" height="503" archive="www.client.silabsoft.org" code="client"> </applet></center> </html> This did not work, it started to load with the java sign but then a red cross appeared, please help..
